text: Hagi pristi ne' Aroni nemofo Eleasa kva hania'zana tavi'mofo masavene, mnanentake zama kremna vu'zane, maka zupa ofa nemiza witi ragane, asomu huzmante'za frenezmantaza masavene, seli nomofo eri'za zantamine, agu'afima maka'za me'neane, hunagru hunte'nea nomofo agu'afi me'nea zanena agrake maka kegava hugahie.
